sentences.sContent: With an almost catatonic concentration, almost without blinking or licking my lips, I read the entire book from first to last word without stopping.
sentences.sContent_eng: With an almost catatonic concentration, almost without blinking or licking my lips, I read the entire book from first to last word without stopping.
sentences.sCn: 近乎精神紧张，我没眨眼或舔嘴唇，停也没停就把整本书看完了。
